xxl.core.math.queries
Interface PointQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
RankBasedHistogram
public interface PointQuery

This interface provides the support for the estimation of point queries respectively the association of a numerical value with a point query. A point query is performed on categorical data over a nominal scale, i.e., additional information of the data is not required. As an estimation of the point query<\tt>, a double value is returned.

See Also:
WindowQuery, RangeQuery

Method Summary
 double pointQuery(java.lang.Object query)
          Performs an estimation of the given point query.
 

Method Detail

pointQuery

Performs an estimation of the given point query.

Parameters:
query - point query to process
Returns:
a numerical value delivering an estimation of the point query
